meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Allie Pape Andy Kravis Bernard Holloway Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4018.

td.p: Allie Pape, a sophomore from Ponte Vedra, Florida
Andy Kravis, a freshman from Farmington Hills, Michigan
Bernard Holloway, a junior from Mitchellville, Maryland

tr.td: THE MIDDLE EAST
POP STARS
TAKE ME TO THE ZOO!
MONOPOLY
EXPLORERS
MMMM!

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Mediterranean Sea

Bernard
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
